courseOutline.title: ChatGPT Security for Engineers
courseOutline.description: This course is designed to provide code engineers with a comprehensive understanding of ChatGPT's capabilities and limitations in the context of security.
courseOutline.goal: Enable code engineers to make informed decisions about using ChatGPT by understanding its capabilities and limitations in the context of security.
courseOutline.audience: Code engineers with basic IT skills but no specific background in cybersecurity

sections.title: What is Cybersecurity?
sections.description: An overview of the field of cybersecurity and its importance.

sections.title: Key Concepts in Security
sections.description: Explanation of basic security concepts such as authentication, authorization, encryption, etc.

sections.title: Architecture Overview
sections.description: A deep dive into the architecture of ChatGPT and how it functions.

sections.title: Security Features and Limitations
sections.description: Discussion on built-in security features and potential limitations of ChatGPT in a secure environment.

sections.title: Handling Sensitive Information
sections.description: Strategies for handling sensitive data with ChatGPT to ensure privacy.

sections.title: Compliance and Regulations
sections.description: Overview of relevant regulations such as GDPR, CCPA, etc. that apply when using ChatGPT.

sections.title: Responsible Use of ChatGPT
sections.description: Guidelines for ethical use of ChatGPT including considerations around bias and fairness.

sections.title: Case Studies
sections.description: Real-world examples illustrating the importance of adhering to ethical guidelines when using AI technologies like ChatGPT.
